ModMetaData.name: More Pause Events - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: sirrandoo
ModMetaData.description: Tweaks some events to pause the game's timer when they occur. (This is the dev version of More Pause Events. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
